gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.rules
Interface ActionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
RuleEngine
public interface ActionHandler

This specifies a class able to handle rule actions.

Method Summary
 AggregationPool pool(java.util.UUID pool, int order, com.google.common.base.Function<Event,java.lang.Boolean> action, int maxCount, long timeWindow, CheckedField... fields)
          ensure the existence of the specified pool and create it if it doesn't exist.
 boolean store(Event event, java.lang.String key)
          store the given event under the specified key.
 boolean transmit(Event event, java.lang.String pushURL)

Method Detail

pool

AggregationPool pool(java.util.UUID pool,
                     int order,
                     com.google.common.base.Function<Event,java.lang.Boolean> action,
                     int maxCount,
                     long timeWindow,
                     CheckedField... fields)
ensure the existence of the specified pool and create it if it doesn't exist.

Parameters:
pool - the pool ID.
order - the pool order in the rule.
action - event handling action.
maxCount - the maximum event count in a group.
timeWindow - the maximum time difference between the most recent and the oldest event in the group.
fields - the aggregation key fields. All events in a group have the same values in those.
Returns:
the pool.

store

boolean store(Event event,
              java.lang.String key)
store the given event under the specified key.

Parameters:
event - event to store.
key - the key to store the event under.
Returns:
true if and only if the operation completed successfully.

transmit

boolean transmit(Event event,
                 java.lang.String pushURL)
transmit the given event.

Parameters:
event - event to transmit.
pushURL - the URL of the push REST service.
Returns:
true if and only if the operation completed successfully.
